text: Wemeldinge is the oldest village in the Zuid-Beveland area of the Dutch province of Zeeland. It is located in the municipality of Kapelle, about 4 km northwest of Yerseke. It is located within the Eastern Scheldt national park. Wemeldinge was a separate municipality until 1970, when it was merged with Kapelle. ==References== ==External links== * Map of the former municipality, around 1868. Category:Populated places in Zeeland Category:Former municipalities of Zeeland Category:Kapelle
title: Wemeldinge
